message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  Hope you'll agree!
That's not a great start, Alice. How about a more reasonable split? 60/40 seems fair.
Okay, let's try something closer to the middle. I'll take 5500, leaving you with 4500.  We both get a decent amount, and it's better than taking the risk of losing even more in the next round.
It seems we both want a bit over half. I'll take your previous offer, but reversed. Time is running out!
